author: David A. Embury
description: Rum-laced zesty citrus with an appealing hint of subtle cognac richness.
name: Grand Slam No.2
recipeIngredient: 45 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice or large cube
